content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your confidence, Herr Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to start at a lower rate, considering it's unfurnished and I'll be providing all the furniture and decorations myself?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Emilia. I understand that you will be furnishing the apartment. How much lower would you like to start? Remember, the location is prime, and the apartment is brand new. I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the quality of the apartment, Herr Schmidt. Given the unfurnished state and the work I'll need to put into it, I was hoping for a rate closer to 800 Euros per month. Is that something we can discuss?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 800 Euros per month is a very reasonable request considering the work you'll put into furnishing the apartment. I'm willing to negotiate a bit further, but I must ensure I get a price that reflects the value of the location and the quality of the apartment. Would you be open to discussing a slightly higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I'm open to discussing a higher price if it's within a range that makes sense for both of us. How much higher were you considering?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I was thinking of a price closer to 900 Euros per month. This would still be a fair deal for you, considering the prime location and the newness of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, 900 Euros per month is not an amount I can afford at this time. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment, I must find a price that aligns with my budget. Is there any room for further negotiation?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I understand your budget concerns. How about we find a middle ground? What if I were to offer you the apartment for 850 Euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, I believe. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, I'm grateful for your willingness to meet me halfway. 850 Euros per month is more acceptable, and it's closer to my budget. Would you be willing to include any additional amenities or services to make the apartment more comfortable for me?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm glad to hear that 850 Euros per month works for you. As for additional amenities or services, I can offer you a free parking spot in the building's garage, which is usually a highly sought-after amenity in the city center. Would this be of interest to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A free parking spot in the garage would be an excellent additional amenity, Herr Schmidt. It would certainly make living in the city center more convenient. With that, I believe we have a deal at 850 Euros per month, including the parking spot. Is there anything else I should know about the apartment before we finalize the agreement?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I'm glad we've reached an agreement. There's nothing else to add regarding the apartment. It's a straightforward deal at 850 Euros per month, with a free parking spot included. I'm sure you'll be very satisfied with your new home. Shall we proceed with the paperwork?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Herr Schmidt, let's proceed with the paperwork. I'm looking forward to finalizing the agreement and moving into my new home. Thank you for your time and for offering such a fair deal.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Emilia. I'm glad we could come to an agreement that satisfies both parties. Once the paperwork is done, you'll have the keys to your new home. I'm sure you'll enjoy living in the city center. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: It's my pleasure, Herr Schmidt. I'm excited about the new chapter in my life that this apartment will host. Thank you for your hospitality and for making this process smooth. I look forward to a long and fruitful tenancy. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
